title: Mannix and Mannix
description:
SKIP AHEAD TO 00:41:12 - The Mannix Brothers make their debut on the Kirk Minihane Show after sharing their opinion of Kirk & Dave Portnoy on their program yesterday. Chaos ensues when Jeff Mannix can't name one example of Kirk being mean to radio guests. Kirk addresses his opinion of both interns (00:00:30). Skip Bayless begs Charles Barkley to stop saying he wants to kill him on national TV (00:10:00). Tom Brady Sr. says the media reporting his sons retirement early is what eventually brought him back (00:18:52). Steve from JP calls Jim and Margery, calls & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
